attributes.action: Stop shops from selling Fireworks, make them for private sale only.
attributes.additional_details:
They scare animals, young children and people with a phobia.
They injure thousands of people every year.
They cause damage to buildings, vehicles,emergancy vehicles etc. 
They petrify animals leaving them shaking for hours and Kids are STILL being sold them in places like asda, tesco and spar.
attributes.background:
Stop the sale of fireworks to the public. Displays for licenced venues only, and private sales. 
Every year fireworks are set off unnecessarily. Fireworks are a simply a nuisance to the public.
